import React, { useState } from 'react' const UserInput = (props) => { const [currentSavings, setCurrentSavings] = useState const submitHandler = (event) => { event.preventDefault(); console.log('Submit'); } const resetHandler = (event) => { console.log('Reset'); } const inputChangeHandler = (event) => { } return (

inputChangeHandler('current-savings', event.target.value)} type="number" id="current-savings" />

) } export default UserInput
